backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with numerous ordered maps and types for journeys, locations, media, ratings, schedules, bookmarks, and geoname data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping requested features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their functionality and recent enhancements.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads root container and main.tsx with SunCalc script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app that sets up theming, identity, query client, backend debugger, and renders LocationMapExplorer.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel with journey and schedule management, calendar-based date selection, and nested editors for related resources.
Utility component exposing backend actor and admin tools to the browser console for debugging.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: UI for managing city albums with media uploads, social links, validation, and album selection.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: UI for importing, searching, paginating, adding, editing, and deleting Geoname city records with file parsing and classification logic.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Interactive 10-heart rating component supporting partial fills, hover, clicks, and readonly mode.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: 3D globe component with time zones, labels, markers, solar/terminator rendering, flight animation, and complex Three.js scene management.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for uploading, previewing, saving, and deleting location photos with file validation and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel using Internet Identity with status display, login/logout handling, and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Leaflet-based map with markers, travel spots, media popups, bookmarks, and UI for interacting with mapped entities.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Renders a tabbed media gallery with photos, videos, and social media embeds, including utilities for parsing YouTube and Instagram URLs.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Provides UI and logic for creating, editing, and deleting music albums and songs, including file uploads and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Displays music albums and their songs in a dialog, allowing selection of songs and showing authentication or empty states.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Implements a bottom music player bar with playback controls, progress tracking, volume handling, and automatic song navigation.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Allows uploading, validating, storing, and executing timezone GeoJSON data with backend and IndexedDB integration.
Displays journeys with expandable itineraries, schedule editing, filtering, and optional map or flight animations.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: UI for listing, filtering, creating, editing, and deleting travel spots, including media uploads and social media link management.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Shows bookmarked places and travel spots grouped by city and type, with icons and focus callbacks.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Panel to view and modify website layout settings such as map settings, display options, and defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and login/logout via Internet Identity, persisting identities and managing AuthClient behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks plus utilities for location search, country-name normalization, social media URL validation, and geocoding via Nominatim.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout, and heading color overrides.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Contains a solar declination calculator and console-based test suite for key astronomical dates.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Provides utilities to compute timezone IDs matching a UTC offset using DST-aware Intl API and quarter‑hour rounding.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Handles loading, caching, validating, and fetching timezone GeoJSON using IndexedDB and backend fallback.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements 3D globe timezone overlay rendering, including coordinate conversion, geometry cleanup, and timezone filtering by quarter‑hour offsets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Empty placeholder file for a Country Map Explorer page.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Main map explorer page managing 2D/3D map modes, search, globe settings, travel spots, bookmarks, music, and schedule item highlights.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing feature requirements for adding a Travelogue Map button and linking it to the 2D map with schedule items.
